description:
Linus Torvalds has announced the first Release Candidate (RC) for Linux kernel 6.14, marking the beginning of public testing. This release comes two weeks after the debut of the Linux 6.13 kernel and the opening of Linux 6.14’s merge window. This milestone sets in motion the rapid development cadence leading up to the stable release,... Read more »

The post Linux 6.14: Rust milestone, AMD and Intel updates, and more appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Linux 6.14: Rust milestone, AMD and Intel updates, and more
